mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM REPLY START WITH REPLY.REP_ID IN (SELECT REP_ID FROM REPLY WHERE REP_ID = REP_PARENT) CONNECT BY PRIOR REP_ID = REP_PARENT ORDER SIBLINGS BY REP_REGDATE ASC ) R LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID) WHERE R.ART_ID = #{art_id} AND R.BRD_ID = #{brd_id}
